nav.home: "All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights and, endowed as they are with reason and conscience, they must behave towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood."

content.text1: "All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights and, endowed as they are with reason and conscience, they must behave towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood."
content.text2: (Art. 1 of the Declaration of Human Rights approved by the UN on December 10, 1948)
